NO_PROFILE_FOUND: > {{member}} no profile found. Set your profile using `profileconfig` command
PC_INTRO:
<:_:979009081325019156> **About Me**: Set an introductionary message
<:_:979009081325019156> **Background**: Set a `Background` for your `Profile`
<:_:979009081325019156> **Favorite Character**: Select your favorite character to be displayed on your `Profile`
<:_:979009081325019156> **Display Card**: Choose a card to be displayed on your `Profile`
<:_:979009081325019156> **Text Color**: Use your `Glows` to change your `Profiles` text color
<:_:979009081325019156> **Profile Glow**: Make your `Profile` shine with one of your `Glows`
<:_:979009081325019156> **Display Awards**: Display different awards on your `Profile`
FC_MENU_DESC: Select your favorite character to be displayed on your profile
SC_MENU_DESC: Shows image of your selected card on profile
BG_MENU_DESC: Displays backgrounds to purchase for the profile
TC_MENU_DESC: Set profile text color with glow
AD_MENU_DESC: Choose awards to display on your profile
CAN_MENU_DESC: Stop the interaction and go back

NON_TRADABLE_NOTE: These items are not tradable and new bg will overwrite existing one. Profile bgs cannot be stored
SET_FRAME_DESC:
Set Description for your custom frame shop for others to view 
Provide in the format: `<bannerURL> <description>`
NEED_MIN_AWARDS: You need at least 6 awards for using this option..
PROVIDE_ACH_ID: Provide Achievement ID to display as shown: 1 2 3 4 5 6
PROVIDE_GLOW_CODE: please provide glow code to set the font color

CANNOT_SET_PG: Cannot set the profile glow because glow is unavailable
